idea:
Syne Square is the go-to resource for new businesses looking to successfully launch new products or services with a measure of creativity driven by the logic that ensures each product finds a unique identity in the minds of the audience, thrives in that space, and becomes successful. In order to do so, Syne Square provides services in the areas of :


i) Business & Strategy Consulting

ii) Design Development

iii) Branding Services

iv) Technology services

v) Training & Mentoring

vi) Content & Digital Marketing

vii) Sales Support & Distribution

viii) Events & Promotions
name: Syne Square Consulting LLP

idea: 3CS IMPEX PRIVATE LIMITED is  Reliable logistics ,Transportation , Import Export services and shipping services provider.We are known as the leading Customs Clearing, Freight Fowarding, & Logistics company as well as Export-Import Consultants. Under our comprehensive gamut of services we offer Logistics, Freight Forwarding, Transport, Warehousing, Insurance, Custom Clearance, Documentation, so on. Moreover we are associated with various Govt. authorities related with shipping, air cargo, transport, trade bodies & export promotion councils and other nodal agencies. We have garnered appreciation of many versatile & corporate customers from Agro to Textile, Engineering, Pharmaceuticals, Food Industry as well as related to Hotel Industry Services. Our mission is to offer the quality service to our valued clients with sole objective to build trustworthy and long lasting relationship with them. We make hard efforts and follow ethical business policies so that we could provide the best possible service to our customers. With the help of qualified and experienced professionals, our company is eager to provides reliable and dependable freight service in every part of the world.
name: 3CS IMPEX PRIVATE LIMITED
